arg.line: -cp ${aswing}/src -swf AsWingLib.swf -header 1:1:1 -pack org/aswing -pack org/aswing/awml -pack org/aswing/awml/common -pack org/aswing/awml/component -pack org/aswing/awml/layout -pack org/aswing/border -pack org/aswing/event -pack org/aswing/geom -pack org/aswing/graphics -pack org/aswing/plaf -pack org/aswing/plaf/asw -pack org/aswing/plaf/asw/border -pack org/aswing/plaf/asw/frame -pack org/aswing/plaf/asw/icon -pack org/aswing/plaf/basic -pack org/aswing/plaf/basic/accordion -pack org/aswing/plaf/basic/border -pack org/aswing/plaf/basic/frame -pack org/aswing/plaf/basic/icon -pack org/aswing/plaf/winxp -pack org/aswing/plaf/winxp/border -pack org/aswing/plaf/winxp/frame -pack org/aswing/plaf/winxp/icon -pack org/aswing/util -version 8
